title: Eligibility Criteria
details: Only NUS undergraduate students shall be eligible to participate in CREATION 2023.

title: Registration
details: To participate in CREATION 2023, participants should register for the NUSync event.
Participation in CREATION 2023 is free of charge.

title: Competition
details: Each participant can choose to sign up for multiple challenges.
Each participant can submit once per challenge statement before the deadline. No resubmission is allowed.
All entries should fulfill the requirements specified in their respective challenge statements.
Challenge statements can be found under the Challenges tab in our website
Registered participants can make submissions through Microsoft Form under the Submission page.
The CREATION committee reserves the right to reject a submission that is submitted past the stipulated deadline.

title: Closing Ceremony
details: TBA via Email to participants and stakeholders

title: Selection Process
details: Assessment criteria will vary among challenge statements.
All entries should fulfill the requirements specified in their respective challenge statement. Participants’ artwork will not be accepted if the challenge’s requirements are not met.
The decision of the judges will be final and binding.

title: Intellectual Property
details: All artwork submitted for CREATION 2023 competition shall become the property of the NUSSU commIT for the respective problem statements.
Winning posters may be modified and used by NUSSU commIT for their future operations.

title: General Rules
details: CREATION committee reserves the right to amend these rules at any time. CREATION committee may also create rules, which will apply to a specific competition only. Participants are responsible for checking the relevant competition page for any updates to the rules. A copy of the latest version of the rules is made available at the website. By continuing to participate in CREATION 2023, participants signify their agreement to any updates to the rules.

details.title: CREATION committee reserves the right to disqualify any participant, if:
subdetails: participant is found to have violated the rules; or
participant cheats or tampers with the operation of the CREATION 2023; or
participant cheats or tampers with the operation of the CREATION 2023; or

participant engages in conduct that is unlawful, offensive, or otherwise leads the CREATION committee to conclude that public association with the participant could cause controversy or generate any negative publicity for CREATION 2023 or its partners.

details: All prizes are non-transferrable and not exchangeable for cash.
